get.summary: REST API is used to get the products list available to that DMA.

parameters.name: dmaID
parameters.description: Unique ID of the channel partner. Default value is "001"

parameters.name: returnAppChannels
parameters.description: Returns IAP appID and appName, appChannel. Value "T"

parameters.name: salesChannel
parameters.description: Device operating system platform. Expected Values: Android/ iOS/ Roku

parameters.name: offerType
parameters.description: Eligible offer Types of the customer. Expected Value: New Customer

parameters.name: useCustomId
parameters.description: Show content item ids with BBC ids

parameters.name: useCustomId
parameters.description: Show content item ids with BBC ids

appServiceID.description:
Unique app id of the product in store.
ServiceID created in store(This is mandatory for in-app purchases (AppStore/ Google Wallet etc.).

rateType.description:
Indicate the Rate Type of the Product/Package.
Ex: "App Store Billing","Amazon App Store Billing","Google Wallet","Roku Payment"

amazonUserId.description:
Unique User ID that was generated by Amazon System.
If Payment method is "Amazon App Store Billing" - then it is mandatory.

parentalControl.description: Active or deactivate the parental control. true or false.

oldParentalControlPin.description: Old secure pin of parental control.
